overview.subtitle: At a glance
overview.title: CJM: Transforming spaces with quality fabrics
overview.paragraph1: CJM oversees the global business of CJM, HARBOUR, ARENA and FLAMENCO, our four decorative textile brands. Founded on November 23, 2000 by the Caracuel Jiménez Marqués family, the company focuses on the development, production and sale of fabrics for indoor and outdoor furniture, for both home and contract markets.
overview.paragraph2: At CJM, fabric manufacturing and design go hand in hand. Our two business divisions are in constant global expansion, with a presence in more than 30 countries across four continents.
overview.paragraph3: Ecology and sustainability mean creating lasting value for our customers, employees and society. The foundation of CJM’s sustainable business strategy is taking responsibility for environmental impact throughout the development of our fabrics and decorative solutions.

madeInSpain.title: Made in Spain
madeInSpain.subtitle: From Andalusia to the world
madeInSpain.paragraph1: CJM WORLDWIDE LTD. designs and manufactures all of its fabrics and wallpapers in Spain. Our production philosophy is to involve our suppliers as an intrinsic value of the company to achieve products of high qualitative value.
madeInSpain.paragraph2: We are an open company and, in developing our four brands, we embrace the personality and influences of each culture for every new collection. We enjoy difference, researching, and walking our own path.
madeInSpain.paragraph3: We strongly believe in the design and innovation of CJMW, HARBOUR, ARENA and FLAMENCO.

headquarters.title: Headquarters
headquarters.paragraph1: Our headquarters are in Montilla, Córdoba, Spain, where we design, store and wholesale our fabrics. We count on platforms that ensure a stable manufacturing and distribution process.
headquarters.paragraph2: Manufacturing is carried out by applying supply chain management strategies. CJMW coordinates all its suppliers, outsources its logistics operations and develops its own creations in-house.
headquarters.paragraph3: Using external services facilitates just-in-time delivery and allows us to offer immediate service to the end customer, with our sales platform acting as a direct extension of the company.

nuestrasMarcas.title: OUR BRANDS
nuestrasMarcas.subtitle: Five labels, the same quality standard
nuestrasMarcas.paragraph1: Design, innovation and durability. These are our brands—the seal that represents us in homes and contract projects around the world.

timeline.step2Desc: Production in Spain with coordinated suppliers.

contactCTA.description: Our team can help you choose the right fabrics to elevate every space. Tell us your idea and we’ll advise you with no obligation.
